message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with scene recognition, which is a subfield of computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel approach that combines image and context information using an attention module, which involves machine learning techniques. Hence, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also uses semantic segmentation to gate features extracted from the RGB image, which involves natural language processing techniques. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed approach on publicly available datasets, which involves multimedia processing. Hence, cs.MM (Multimedia) is also a possible sub-category.
